modes:
  The broad behavior of `mkname` is determined by the mode you choose,
  and choosing a mode is required.

  compound
    Creates a name using the parts of different names from the names
    database.

  pick
    Picks a random name from the names database.

  list
    Lists the values for a particular field in the names database.

  syllable
    Creates a name from the syllables of different names selected
    randomly from the names database.

  View the help for the specific mode for details on their options.
